mapper.insert: insert into plateform_release_record (id, platform_id, goods_id, release_state, release_price, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{platformId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{releaseState,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{releasePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update plateform_release_record set platform_id = #{platformId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, release_state = #{releaseState,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, release_price = #{releasePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, platform_id, goods_id, release_state, release_price, create_time, update_time from plateform_release_record
